snippet.title: Quinty/Mendel Palace Remake Gameplay (UNRELEASED 1998)
snippet.description:
It begins, and I return.
The first part of my coverage of the new Sparceleak is footage of a cancelled remake of GameFreak's first game called Quinty. In the United States, it was called Mendel Palace. GameFreak fans will know this as Satoshi Tajiri's first game, before Pokémon. This is an unreleased remake for the Super Famicom which was in development from 1998 until ultimately being cancelled. To my knowledge, this is the first ever footage of the game.

More to come.
